Sentencas: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles have been prepared using ultrasonication at 20 kHz.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Samples characterization was committed via SEM-EDX, TEM, XRD, and Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Various experimental parameters were examined, including precursor/substrate amounts, ultrasonication intensity, and type of solvent used.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Insights to the agglomeration of the prepared nanoparticles depending on the preparation parameters are given.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As ultrasonic source we used either an ultrasonic probe by Sonics & Materials Inc. (20 kHz, 750 W net output) or a Bandelin SONOPULS HD 3200 ultrasound generator (20 kHz, 200 W net output) at intensities between 30 and 100 W/cm2.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The rhenium oxide nanoparticles haven been decorated on state-of-the-art anode materials (NiO/GDC) for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) in order to prepare catalytically more active anode powders.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These experiments revealed that ultrasonication intensity and solvents used are able to affect final nanoparticles size distribution and morphology.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At the same time, ratio of precursor and substrate compounds amounts as well as ultrasonication intensity and duration were all found to affect the decoration loading extend of nanoformations on substrate powders.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results showing the influence of the above-mentioned parameters allowed for the quantification of the effects on the loading and the preferable sites of the decoration.
Titulo: Rhenium oxide nanoparticles-Sonochemical synthesis and integration on anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells
